title: Publisher Correction: The cooperative action of CSB, CSA, and UVSSA target TFIIH to DNA damage-stalled RNA polymerase II.
abstract_text: An amendment to this paper has been published and can be accessed via a link at the top of the paper.

Subject terms DNA damage and repair Nucleotide excision repair Transcription issue-copyright-statement © The Author(s) 2020 Correction to: Nature Communications 10.1038/s41467-020-15903-8, published online 30 April 2020. The original version of this Article contained an error in the hyperlink to an interactive volcano plot for Figure 5 panel b ( GFP-UVSSA vs GFP-UVSSA + UV ). This has been corrected in both the PDF and HTML versions of the Article.
